hanzi-su-wiki:
態

Значения

Нарочно, намеренно; вид, форма, состояние

Мнемоника

Приспосабливаться сердцем 心, как медведь 能 при дрессировке. Состояние, поведение, внешность (как у медведя — всегда спокойного).

Варианты

态
purpleculture_pinyin:
tài
(bound form); appearance; shape; form; state; attitude; (grammar) voice
(переплетенная форма); внешний вид; форма; форма; государственный; отношение; (грамматика) голос
rtega_mnemonic:
態態RS
态态		manner, bearing, attitude
  • a heart 心 standing up to many people 能
  • ⓢ having a fat 太 heart 心
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 态)
Pictophonetic: 能 indicates the sound; 心 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 態度 [ tài du ]: manner; bearing; attitude; approach; Classifiers: 个
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 能 [ néng ] can, may; capable, full of energy
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
heisig_chinese_memo: This guy has an attitude problem – lots of ability, but his heart's not in it.
heisig_constituent: attitude, ability, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, spoon, sitting on the ground, heart, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
Keyword_KANJIDIC: attitude, condition, figure, appearance, voice (of verbs)
koohiiStory1: This guy has an attitude problem – lots of ability, but his heart´s not in it.
koohiiStory2: Having a good attitude means believing in your heart that you have the ability to do anything - like memorizing more than 2000 kanji, for example.
jp_example_words:
形態(けいたい): form, shape, figure
実態(じったい): truth, fact
態勢(たいせい): attitude, conditions, preparations
態々(わざわざ): expressly, specially, doing something especially rather than incidentally
事態(じたい): situation, present state of affairs, circumstances
状態(じょうたい): current status, condition, situation, circumstances, state
態度(たいど): attitude, manner
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have a great ability because your heart gives you the appearance of a superhuman. Your heart is really strong and powerful, fuelling your body to the best of its ability. All this together gives you the appearance of someone in top condition.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See yourself in this ideal appearance. Everyone loves to look at you because you look so awesome. Your heart has given you many great abilities. Feel strong and powerful in this body of yours.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you may have the appearance of someone who is super strong, powerful, and awesome, you do have one shortcoming. You don’t know how to tie (たい) a tie. Actually, you don’t even know how to tie your shoes, let alone your tie. How embarrassing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Since you don’t know how to tie a tie or tie your shoes, you wear slip ons and clip ons. Hear the noise of Velcro being undone as you kick off your shoes and unclip your tie after a hard day’s work at the office.
Ru_Meaning: attitude, condition, figure, appearance, voice (of verbs)
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 能 (よく、ノウ способность), 熊 (くま、ユウ медведь).
Ru_Radicals: 匕 (ложка), 厶 (значок МУ), 心 (сердце), 月 (месяц)
Ru_trainchinese:
tài: (графема) состояние, форма, вид, положение
tài: (сущ) (грам.) залог
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your heart's (心) ability (能) determines your condition
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An overly big heart will create a great attitude in someone.

    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul

tài
вм. 态
Radicals: 能, 心  (ability, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have a great ability because your heart gives you the appearance of a superhuman. Your heart is really strong and powerful, fuelling your body to the best of its ability. All this together gives you the appearance of someone in top condition.
See yourself in this ideal appearance. Everyone loves to look at you because you look so awesome. Your heart has given you many great abilities. Feel strong and powerful in this body of yours.
Reading Mnemonic
While you may have the appearance of someone who is super strong, powerful, and awesome, you do have one shortcoming. You don’t know how to tie (たい) a tie. Actually, you don’t even know how to tie your shoes, let alone your tie. How embarrassing.
Since you don’t know how to tie a tie or tie your shoes, you wear slip ons and clip ons. Hear the noise of Velcro being undone as you kick off your shoes and unclip your tie after a hard day’s work at the office.
